CustomField.description: based on registration date, shows in which month of leasing period the vehicle currently is
CustomField.formula: /* To find the number of months between two dates, subtract the year of the earlier date from the year of the later date and multiply the difference by 12. * Next, subtract the month of the earlier date from the month of the later date, and add that difference to the value of the first set of operations. * ((YEAR(date_1) - YEAR(date_2))*12) + (MONTH(date_1) - MONTH(date_2)) */ ((YEAR(TODAY()) - YEAR(Registration_Date__c))*12) + (MONTH(TODAY()) - MONTH(Registration_Date__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: based on registration date, shows in which month of leasing period the vehicle currently is
CustomField.label: Current Month in Leasing
